game_description: Meet Nibbler, your new virtual best friend. Welcome your furry friend into your world and watch as it answers your commands to jump, walk, sit and come to you. Take Nibbler to the park or bring him or her into your home using the passthrough feature on Quest. Welcome a Nibbler into your world today, and keep an eye out for new features. With future updates coming soon, you will be able to earn rewards by petting , feeding and playing with Nibbler. Expand your world with Nibbler, and keep an eye out for game updates.
review_1: its a little hard to get the voice commend to work but I really love the game
